Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Conical-base goblet with a restricted mouth and simple lip. Of the so-called black and red style, it has been softly polished on the inside and highly burnished on the outside, in order to create a rippled effect (hence "rippled ware"). The lip is decorated with small, closely impressed oblique lines .
